ygData.subject: Re: Pie tins and skewers.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh that s WEAK!!! I would HATE to have to gate back and forth between Halas and SteamFront to get stuff, that s the VERY OPPOSITE ENDS OF THE WORLD from each
ygData.messageBody:
Oh that's WEAK!!!

I would HATE to have to gate back and forth between
Halas and SteamFront to get stuff, that's the VERY
OPPOSITE ENDS OF THE WORLD from each other.

WEEeAKKK!!!

Let's start petitioning for pie tins. We can get
skewers from the shops in Ak'anon (at least I did).
But Pie Tins are no where to be found.

-Kryogen

--- Phil Showalter <phil@...> wrote:
> From: "Phil Showalter" <phil@...>
>
> Interesting note..... I created a secondary
> character and went to Halas,
> rode the ferry, entered the gates, went left and
> entered a shop. Lo and
> behold!! They had pie tins and skewers for sale for
> about 9 gold each. Don't
> know if a player sold them to the shopkeeper or not,
> but they were
> definitely there. FYI.....
>
>
>
